channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- FactoryCamera
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- FactoryCamera

item.title: CVE-2022-39858|2024-08-03T12:07:42.842Z -- samsung%20mobile -- factorycamera
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in AtBroadcastReceiver in FactoryCamera prior to version 3.5.51 allows attackers to write arbitrary file as FactoryCamera privilege.

item.title: CVE-2022-39861|2024-08-03T12:07:42.934Z -- samsung%20mobile -- factorycamera
item.description: Unprotected Receiver in AtBroadcastReceiver in FactoryCamera prior to version 3.5.51 allows attackers to record video without camera privilege.

item.title: CVE-2022-27838|2024-08-03T05:41:09.898Z -- samsung%20mobile -- factorycamera
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in FactoryCamera prior to version 2.1.96 allows attacker to access the file with system privilege.
